thread.title: Chelsea boss Antonio Conte opens up on chats with three Italian legends
thread.title_full: Chelsea boss Antonio Conte opens up on chats with three Italian legends

title: Chelsea boss Antonio Conte opens up on chats with three Italian legends
text:
Premier League Championship Scottish Premiership Chelsea boss Antonio Conte opens up on chats with three Italian legends ANTONIO CONTE has lifted the lid on his contact with Chelsea legends Carlo Ancelotti, Gianluca Vialli and Gianfranco Zola. PUBLISHED: 00:05, Thu, Feb 23, 2017 | UPDATED: 00:16, Thu, Feb 23, 2017 
Antonio Conte has flourished in his first season in charge of the club. 
With the Blues eight points clear at the top of the Premier League table, Conte is well on course to deliver the title. 
And it seems Conte wasnâ€™t afraid to take advice. 
Before taking the post, he spoke to Ancelotti and has since caught up with past players. GETTY Antonio Conte is flying at Chelsea this season GETTY Antonio Conte spoke to Carlo Ancelotti before taking the Chelsea job Chelsea's FA Cup player ratings against Wolves Sat, February 18, 2017
